text: Maxwell G. Towle (September 9, 1889 – April 27, 1969) was an American football player and coach. He served as the head football coach at Hastings College in Hastings, Nebraska from 1914 to 1915. Towle was the starting quarterback at the University of Nebraska from 1912 to 1913, leading the 1913 Cornhuskers to an undefeated record in his senior season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1889 births Category:1969 deaths Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Hastings Broncos football coaches Category:Nebraska Cornhuskers football players
title: Max Towle
